about_the_game: Ekoh 99 has been isolated for years, but a job posting for the mysterious planet’s new town planner brings you to this quaint tropical paradise. Your work is cut out for you. The town has been devastated by an evil Robot Rebellion, and the brilliant quantum scientist: Dr Terra has disappeared! Fulfil your destiny and rebuild the town, befriend its new citizens, bring the planet back to life, and uncover the lost secrets of Ekoh Beach as you return it to its former glory! In this Demo, you can set up your base and build a little bit of the Town (Bakery and Tessa's House). Most of the large Town map is available to explore as well as the mines.

name: Ekoh Beach Demo
short_description: Ekoh Beach has been destroyed by a nasty Robot Rebellion and is in urgent need of a new Town Planner! Your job? Get the town thriving again with your particle-harvesting skills and restore it back to its heyday. Collect resources, make friends, and solve the mystery of quantum scientist Dr Terra!
